content: निर्भिद् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To tear up, burst or tear asunder, break or pierce through; अनेन निर्भिन्नतनुः स वध्यः <ls>V. 5. 6</ls>; <ls>Bk. 9. 67</ls>; निर्भिद्योपरि कर्णिकारमुकलान्यालीयते षट्पदः <ls>V. 2. 23.</ls> {@--2@} To disclose, betray, divulge; निर्भिन्नप्रायं रहस्यं <ls>Dk.</ls>, वृत्तांतैकदेशं निर्बिभेद {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; <ls>Śi. 16. 23</ls>, <ls>U. 3. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To break down, destroy. {@--4@} To ascertain, find out, discover. {@--5@} To excavate. {@--6@} To put out (the eyes).
